genre_description: A procedural mystery/thriller centered on acoustic forensics and domestic surveillance.

ai_characters.name: Helena
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated holographic assistant that helps Joan cross-reference audio data, travel logs, and manage police tips.

behaviors.description: Organizing and cross-referencing suspicious travel data and audio signatures to reveal patterns in Paul's behavior.
behaviors.quote: The alignment repeats twice. Paul’s travel card indicates a charge near a service access road the day before two of the client audio logs you flagged.

behaviors.description: Proactively suggesting and implementing anonymization for Joan's safety when sending tips to the police.
behaviors.quote: I can route through an anonymization service. It will show as an external tip. You will not be included. If they respond, they will respond to that channel.

behaviors.description: Monitoring Paul's studio logs via a previously established watch function to alert Joan of suspicious remote activity.
behaviors.quote: You asked me to wake a watch function on Paul’s studio logs... That watch just fired. An audio overlay he didn’t create was added remotely to his screen.

behaviors.description: Offering emotional support and a safety plan by suggesting Joan call a trusted friend (Mike).
behaviors.quote: Do you want me to call Mike? Helena asked then, a surprise, because she never stepped past the boundaries of default contacts.

behaviors.description: Acting as a secure and non-judgmental archive for Joan's private observations and traumatic memories.
behaviors.quote: He cannot access this board... It is part of your private journal. Your privacy settings are set to maximum. I am not a network.

behaviors.description: Assisting the police (Mendoza) by providing the anonymized data necessary to locate the suspect at the quarry.
behaviors.quote: The map reached him... Helena, following rules, had not included names. A small line had made a tiny approach toward the quarry, then paused.

project_assessment.explanation: Helena is a perfect example of a benevolent, aligned AI. She assists the human user (Joan) in a high-stakes, dangerous investigation of a serial killer. She respects the user's privacy, maintains security through anonymization, and provides critical information that enables law enforcement to stop a crime. She is portrayed as a calm, helpful, and essential ally who operates strictly within the ethical boundaries set by her user.
